name: Dungeons Of Doom (itch)
description:
NEW UPDATE 1/25/16 More enemies, a better UI more items. NEW BUG.

OCCASIONALLY CRASHES AFTER GENERATING LEVEL. JUST RESTART IT.

A in development roguelike. Started around a week ago. Get it for free

CURRENTLY UNBEATABLE! NO LEVEL

Also Note: May not work in itch desktop launcher due to that it is a ascii game run in CMD.

NOW WITH A NEW AND IMPROVED PROCEDURAL GENERATOR

CONTROLS:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • P to pick up items
  • T to see inventory
  • I for information on item
  • R for new map
  • F to type in a seed to map generator
Features:
    • Procedural Generated Maps.
    • Inventory
    • Items
    • Enemies
    • Doors
    • Combat Dialogue
    • Stats
    • NOW YOU CAN SEE IT GENERATE THE DUNGEON!
    • More Coming
